comment: MR5 Mixed Russia RKZ-5 (RK5, DP to or near top) and MARS-2-2 (RRB, DP to T around -40), both using Meteorit-2 radar^

MRr Mixed Russia MARS no RH (RR1, no RH so sfc DP only) and MARS-2 (RR2, either RRA or RRB, DP to T around -40)^
MRz Mixed Russia MRZ no RH (RZ1, surface DP only) and MRZ-3A (RZ3, 31313=52703, DP to or near top)^
